title: Proton in region with electric and magnetic field

content.question: A proton traveling horizontally with velocity <math alttext="Vector v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>→</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></mstyle></math> enters a region with a uniform electric field of magnitude <math alttext="uppercase E" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> to the right and a uniform magnetic field of magnitude <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> into the page, as shown above. At the instant it enters the region, what is the magnitude and direction of the proton’s acceleration?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction lowercase e times uppercase E over m sub p" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> to the right
